hero.subtitle: 10th Anniversary Celebration
hero.story: You’re receiving this invitation because you’ve been an essential part of our journey. 10 years. 3,652 days. Infinite memories — a wild and wonderful ride. As we mark this milestone, we’d love to celebrate love, adventure, and to thank you — the ones who made our journey richer and unforgettable.

rsvp.title: Confirm your attendance
rsvp.description: Program details will be shared with you in August/September this year. To truly enjoy this time together, we hope you’ll stay the night and celebrate with us. We will cover 1 night hotel (21st Nov 2026) – standard room and airport transportation (Cam Ranh airport to & from the hotel).

closing.message: We can't wait to celebrate with you.
